protocol: TCP/IP, HTTP, DHCP, DNS, DDNS, PPPoE, SMTP, NTP ,RTSP
system: Embedded RTOS design, dual core 32-bit DSP(TI DAVINCI DM368F)
basic: Reset button, Anti-flicker, Dual stream, Heartbeat, Password protection
videocompression: H.264 High Profile, JPEG Screen shot
imagesetting: Saturation, Brightness, Contrast adjustable through Client software or web server
intelligentalarm: Motion detect, Video loss, Network disconnection, IP address conflict, Storage full, Storage error
